Name: File System - Create File
Description: Creates an empty file, using the full path that is provided.

Parameters.Name: FilePath
Parameters.Label: The full path where the file will be created.
Parameters.HelpText: Provide the entire physical path to which the physical file will be created. For example, 'C:\Temp\MyFile.txt' will create am empty text file named 'MyFile.txt' in the 'Temp' folder on the C: drive.
